word.definition: The [] is the number that tells how many times a base number is used as a factor.
The product that results from multiplying the same number over and over is a [] of that number.
A number raised to the second power.
A number raised to the third power.
When a number is written using exponents, the [] is the number that is used as a factor.
The place of a digit in a number tells you its [].
[] is a way to write a number that shows the sum of each digit multiplied by its place value.
A [] is one out of 1,000 equal parts of a whole.
A [] is one out of 100 equal parts of a whole.
A [] is a symbol used to separate the ones place from the tenths place in decimal numbers.
A number with one or more digits to the right of the decimal point is called a [].
Decimals that name the same part of a whole are called [].
The name given to each group of three digits in a place-value chart.
The position of a digit in a number.
The usual way of writing a number that shows only its digits, no words.
The value given to a digit by its place in a number.
A chart showing the value of each number in a multi-digit whole number.
The [] states that addends can be added in any order and the sum remains the same.
The [] states that addends can be regrouped and the sum remains the same.
The sum of any number and 0 equals the number.
A number like 10, 100, 1,000 and so on. It is the result of using only 10 as a factor.
The result of using lesser numbers to estimate a sum or product is called an [].
The result of using greater numbers to estimate a sum or product is called an [].
[] are products found by breaking one of two factors into ones, tens, hundreds, and so on, and then multiplying each of these by the other factor.
You can [] to find a number that is close to the exact amount.
A [] figure or amount is one that is given as a whole number, usually one ending in 0.
[] are numbers that are easy to compute with mentally.
A number that is being divided.
The number that divides the dividend.
The result of a division problem.
The number that is left after one whole number is divided by another.
A dividing method in which the dividend is separated into addends that are easy to divide.
A [] is used to locate points in a plane using an ordered pair of numbers.
A horizontal line passing through the origin that includes both positive and negative numbers is called the [].
A vertical line passing through the origin that includes both positive and negative numbers is called the [].
The [] is the point where the two axes of a coordinate grid intersect. It is represented by the ordered pair (0, 0).
An [] is pair of numbers used to locate a point on a coordinate grid.
The first number in an ordered pair, which names the distance to the right or left from the origin along the x-axis, is called the [].
The second number in an ordered pair, which names the distance up or down from the origin along t he y-axis, is called the [].
A plane that is formed when two number lines intersect at a right angle.
The difference between the values on the scale of a graph is an [].
A set of numbers that follows a rule is a [].
Terms that are in the same relative position as one another in a pair of number sequences are [].
A list of numbers that follows a specific pattern.
A number in a pattern or sequence.
Common fractions used for estimating, such as ¼, ⅓, ½, ⅔, and ¾, are called [].
[] are fractions that name the same part of a whole region, length, or set.
A [] is a number that is the denominator of two or more fractions.
The greatest of the common factors of two or more numbers.
The least common multiple of the denominators of two fractions.
The least multiple, other than 0, common to sets of multiples.
A multiple of a number is the product of that number and any whole number.
The top number in a fraction. It tells how many of the equal parts are being used.
A fraction in which the GCF of the numerator and the denominator is 1.
Fractions that have the same denominator.
Fractions that have different denominators.
The highest number that can be divided exactly into two or more numbers.
A number that has a whole-number part and a fractional part is called a [].
A familiar number used as a point of reference.
A whole number that is a multiple of two or more numbers.
The bottom number in a fraction. It represents the total number of equal parts.
The process of resizing a number when it is multiplied by a fraction that is greater than or less than 1.
A fraction with a numerator of 1 is called a [].
A display of responses along a number line, with dots or Xs recorded above the responses to indicate the number of times a response occurred, is called a [].
Collected information is called [].
An [] is a value that is much greater or much less than the other values in a data set.
A [] is a mathematical phrase that contains numbers and at least one operation.
To [] means doing the calculations to find the value of an expression.

The [] tells which calculations to do before others. First, simplify inside parentheses, brackets, and braces. Then multiply and divide in order from left to right. Finally, add and subtract in order from left to right.
Curved symbols used in mathematical expressions and equations to group numbers or variables together are called [].
Square symbols used in mathematical expressions and equations to group numbers or variables together are called [].
Symbols used with parentheses and brackets in mathematical expressions and equations to group numbers or variables together are called [].
To change from one unit of measurement to another.
An amount divided equally.
Distance measured between two points.
A customary unit of length less than 1 foot is an [].
A customary unit of length equal to 12 inches is a [].
A customary unit of length equal to 3 feet is a [].
A customary unit of length equal to 5,280 feet is a [].
[] is the volume of a container measured in liquid units.
A customary unit of capacity equal to 8 fluid ounces is a [].
A customary unit of capacity equal to 8 [] is a cup.
A customary unit of capacity equal to 2 cups is a [].
A customary unit of capacity equal to 2 pints is a [].
A customary unit of capacity equal to 4 quarts is a [].
[] is a measure of how light or heavy something is.
A customary unit of weight equal to 2,000 pounds is a [].
A customary unit of weight equal to 16 ounces is a [].
A customary unit of weight less than 1 pound is an [].
A decimal system of measurement. Includes units such as meter, gram, and liter.
A metric unit of length that is equal to one tenth of a meter is a [].
A metric unit of length that is equal to 10 meters is a [].
A metric unit of length equal to 1,000 meters is a [].
A metric unit of length equal to 100 centimeters is a [].
A metric unit of length equal to 10 millimeters is a [].
A metric unit of length less than a centimeter is a [].
A metric unit of capacity equal to 1,000 milliliters is a [].
A metric unit of capacity less than a liter is a [].
[] is the measure of the amount of matter in an object.
A metric unit of mass less than a gram is a [].
A metric unit of mass equal to 1,000 milligrams is a [].
A metric unit of mass equal to 1,000 grams is a [].
In an [], all sides are the same length.
An [] has at least two sides of the same length.
In a [], no sides are the same length.
A triangle with 1 right angle and 2 acute angles.
An [] has three acute angles.
An [] has one obtuse angle.
A [] is a quadrilateral with both pairs of opposite sides parallel and equal in length.
A [] is a quadrilateral that has one pair of parallel sides.
A [] is a rectangle with all sides the same length.
A [] is a parallelogram with four right angles.
A [] is a parallelogram with all sides the same length.
[] is the number of cubic units needed to fill a solid figure.
A [] is a solid figure with six identical squares as its faces.
A [] is the volume of a cube that measures 1 unit along each edge.
A [] is a solid figure with six rectangular faces.
Two parallel congruent faces in a prism.
A figure that is made of two or more three-dimensional figures.
A [] is a rule that uses symbols to relate two or more quantities.
